citations.narrative:
*** The Lynx enclosure needs to be cleaned. There are animal carcass and bones in the enclosure that were fed out over
a week ago, there is a paper plate in the enclosure and an accumulation of feces. Animal carcasses and uneaten food
should be removed in a timely manner to deter pests. Trash and excess feces should be removed in a timely manner to
reduce disease hazards and odors.
Correct by: March 23, 2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.131(a) 
   
Sanitation. 
*** The Lynx enclosure needs to be cleaned. There are animal carcass and bones in the enclosure that were fed out over 
a week ago, there is a paper plate in the enclosure and an accumulation of feces. Animal carcasses and uneaten food 
should be removed in a timely manner to deter pests. Trash and excess feces should be removed in a timely manner to 
reduce disease hazards and odors. 
 
Correct by: March 23, 2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
